TI_TEXT.P: Услуги на здравеопазването и социалните дейности

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Hull City Council. Room 154. The Guildhall. Alfred Gelder Street

SHORT_DESCR.P: Hull City Council is seeking suitably qualified providers to supply & deliver adult residential & nursing care homes for the authorities adult social care services. The authority intends to establish a Dynamic Purchasing System (DPS) for the provision of these service. The length of contracts will be governed by the individual needs of the service user. Suppliers can apply to join the DPS at any point during its lifetime. We anticipate the launch of the DPS to be 23 April 2018. The DPS will be categorised by levels of care:
— Category 2: Standard residential care with nursing provision,

The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements. Mini competitions from the DPS will commence 28.5.2018.

MAIN_SITE.P: Only homes inside the Hull City boundary or within a 10 mile radius of the City boundary will be accepted on to the DPS.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Organisations accepted on to the DPS will be invited (via categories) to mini competitions throughout the lifetime of the DPS. Suppliers will bid against individual care placements. The evaluation for this will be based on which proposal best meets the needs of the care plan and the individuals (service user) needs.
Standard residential care: This is the minimum requirement and expectation for services providing personal care and accommodation together, suitable to meet a range of needs for adults of all ages.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: As per service users needs identified within care plan /support plan.

INFO_ADD.P: The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements.

TITLE.P: Standard Residential Care with Nursing Provision

MAIN_SITE.P: Only homes inside the Hull City boundary or within a 10 mile radius of the City boundary will be accepted on to the DPS.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Organisations accepted on to the DPS will be invited (via categories) to mini competitions throughout the lifetime of the DPS. Suppliers will bid against individual care placements. The evaluation for this will be based on which proposal best meets the needs of the care plan and the individuals (service user) needs.

In addition to core elements, the minimum requirement and expectation placed over and above personal care and accommodation provided together; where additional care is provided by qualified nurses in order to ensure that the full needs of resident(s) are met.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: As per service users needs identified within care plan /support plan.

INFO_ADD.P: The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements.

MAIN_SITE.P: Only homes inside the Hull City boundary or within a 10 mile radius of the City boundary will be accepted on to the DPS.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Organisations accepted on to the DPS will be invited (via categories) to mini competitions throughout the lifetime of the DPS. Suppliers will bid against individual care placements. The evaluation for this will be based on which proposal best meets the needs of the care plan and the individuals (service user) needs.

In addition to the delivery of standard requirements these individually tailored and designed packages of care will identify the additional support requirements, over and above standard and will be brokered with the successful provider (see service specification).

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: As per service users needs identified within care plan /support plan.

INFO_ADD.P: The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements.

MAIN_SITE.P: Only homes inside the Hull City boundary or within a 10 mile radius of the City boundary will be accepted on to the DPS.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Organisations accepted on to the DPS will be invited (via categories) to mini competitions throughout the lifetime of the DPS. Suppliers will bid against individual care placements. The evaluation for this will be based on which proposal best meets the needs of the care plan and the individuals (service user) needs.

In addition to the delivery of standard requirements these individually tailored and designed packages of care will identify the additional support requirements, over and above standard and will be brokered with the successful provider. (see service specification).

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: As per service users needs identified within care plan /support plan.

INFO_ADD.P: The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements.

SUITABILITY.P: As described within the tender documentation /specification.

REFERENCE_TO_LAW.P: As described within the tender documentation /specification.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: As described within the tender documentation /specification.

INFO_ADD.P: The DPS will be established for a period of not more than 10 years (initially 8 years with option to extend for up to 2 years). The authority proposes to enter into individual contract(s) for individual placements. The contracting period will therefore be implicit on the length of placement of an individual as their place of residence until such time that the resident either moves to a different placement or passes away. The continuation of placement is subject to not less than annual review and is contingent on the placements’ ability to continue to meet the eligible care and support needs as identified within the individual service users care plan. The anticipated service commencement date is May 2018. Any contract(s) awarded as a result of this procurement will be awarded on the basis of the offer that is the most economically advantageous to the authority and best meets the needs of the service users individual care plan. A maximum price per week is fixed for each category (see service specification).
